item.text: (ga) @#/ ! /stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 第二般若兩萬五千頌第三部
@##/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bzhi
bcu gcig pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi
khams sgrubs pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang /
chos skyon med pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas so/ /mngon par thugs su chud do/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par
rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo / /ston to/ /brjod do/ /'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /
gsal bar mdzad do/ /yang dag par ston to/ /de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas

lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra phyung ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN Da ri ka dang / mAn dA ra ba dang / mAn dA ra ba chen po 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to/ /kye ma shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa 'di bstan pas/ lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab

'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang

chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am/ mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i

slad du/ nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo / /bsam gtan gyi

pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /

dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams
dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad

pas stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis

stong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /dgra bcom pa nyid dgra

bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo / /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chen mo ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o/ /de ni chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong la/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang / chos gang yang mngon par

rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am mi 'khor ba 'am rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/ de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba 'am yongs su ma mthong ba

ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am mi 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin du mngon

par ma grub pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ /mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ /smon pa ma mchis pa

ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ /de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang rab tu dgod pa dang gzhag pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dgrol

ba dang smos pa dang gsal bar bgyi ba dang yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ngo / /gang sus kyang ma

bstan sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so/ /gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la gang su yang sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis

pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dben pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das

pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni thub pa med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes

rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma

mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma

mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di

ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni skad cig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ chos thams cad byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang

'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /

gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi ba dang skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha

rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan pa dang / sgrar brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mig yor gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ me long

gi bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di

ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa'i

pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du

phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba yang dag pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du

phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa'i mun pa

thams cad sel ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med

pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rab tu spangs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' rnam par spong ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di

ni nyams pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni

nam mkha'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol du

phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad tshol bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams

cad mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir

ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab

kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni

chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol

du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

dngos po med pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams

ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang tshor ba

dang sems dang chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang /

mi dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa

bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dbang po'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di

lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du

phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni smon

pa med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol du phyin

pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin

pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa dang / ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dang bzod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ le lo dang brtson 'grus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsam

gtan dang 'khrug pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab dang 'chal

pa'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad thub pa med pa'i

phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa med pa'i

phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa dang /

thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi

chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams

cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u nyi shu dgu pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag

ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag

pa de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su gzung ba'o/ /gang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin

nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa lta ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su dris so/ /yongs su zhus so/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur la 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang klog

cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do snyam pa dang /

de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur

la/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes

rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ sngon pha rol du phyin pa drug la ma spyad pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mos par bgyi bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems pa dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par gyur to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad

pa'i tshe/ dad pa dang mos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la bsnyen

bkur ma bgyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba

rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam

gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa

dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa

rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su ma zhus/ yongs su ma dris so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa

ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shin du zab na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar kyang ci che/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du

phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa

nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs

med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin

rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi

bar la mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar kyang ci che/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal

ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /kau shi ka de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brjod do/ /kau shi ka thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa

thams cad spang bar 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang /

lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i

rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /khams

gsum gyi phul du 'gyur bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /bdud thams cad pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la

brtson par bya'o/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol

du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin

pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/

ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na

'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang

mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ kau shi ka de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa legs so legs so/ /kau shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs

kyis byung ngo / /kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi gnas te/ /gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /tshor ba

dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /mig la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mig la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mig

la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs

la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe chos la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ chos la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/

mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe

yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /sa'i khams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sa'i khams la

brtson par byed pa yin no/ /chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i

khams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /ma rig pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe ma rig pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ ma rig pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang

tshor ba dang / sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rga shi la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rga shi la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa

la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas

pa de'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson

par byed pa yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul

gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ 'phags

pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe

gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed pa

yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi

'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad

la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rang byang chub la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rang

byang chub la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson

par byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs mi dmigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang /

'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang

la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun mi dmigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams

dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /

smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi

dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang /

rang byang chub mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la

mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa

de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung

ba la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la mi sbyor

mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe mngon

par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i

tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi

bar la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa

sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa dbus su mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba

phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dbus su mi dmigs so/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi

chos sum bcu rtsa bdun phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dbus su mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs med pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mngon

par shes pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dbus su mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /

gzungs kyi sgo rnams dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad

sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sngon gyi

mthar mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni zab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba

dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo/ /'phags pa'i

bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa

dang mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par

rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol

du phyin pa zab bo/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gting dpag dka'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar

'byung ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gting dpag dka' ba'i

phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams gting dpag

dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad gting dpag dka'

ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /

rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ /pha rol du phyin pa

thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /

gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang

dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du

phyin pa tshad med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes

pa zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams

cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /

tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa

dang / mngon par shes pa rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bzhi bcu gnyis pa/ de ci'i phyir zhe

na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /skye mched dang khams dang

rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ma yin no/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi

zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par

shes pa rnams ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so

yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi zab pa nyid

gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs gting dpag dka'o

zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /skye mched dang khams dang / rten

cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gting dpag dka'o

zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /

mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /ting nge

'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi

chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/

rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /

skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun tshad med do zhes

bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi

spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du

phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang

'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i

bus gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de ltar zab bo/ /de ltar gting dpag dka'o/ /de ltar rtogs par dka'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ 'jigs sngang shing skrag par 'gyur du mchi'o/ /the tshom

dang nem nur 'tshal du mchi'o/ /mos pa ma mchis par 'gyur du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan par bgyi ste/ des ni shes rab kyi pha rol

du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /the tshom dang nem nur 'tshal bar mi 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang gong nas gong du mos pa dang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin

du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i

mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na nyes pa cir 'gyur/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

zab mo 'di bshad na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ 'jigs par 'gyur/ sngang bar 'gyur/ skrag par 'gyur te/ phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/ /spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni mos par yang mi 'gyur te/ kau shi ka

theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas/ spangs pa'i phyir de log par ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed cing sogs par 'gyur te las byas

pa dang bsags pa des kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dka' ba de lta bu'i gnas yod do/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po lung ma bstan pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba lta yod dam/ smras pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo

'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

gcig gam/ gnyis las mi 'da' bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ /

de de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang gong nas gong du 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang

klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'o/ /pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mang po la
bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dpe gsal bar bdag gis spobs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de'i dpe gsal bar bdag gis spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo'i rmi lam na shes rab kyi pha rol du

phyin pa bsgom zhing bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba nas/ snying po byang chub la mchis pa'i

bar du gyur na yang bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyid

kyis ma log pa zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang / tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / sbyin pa yongs

su btang ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol

du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par gyur te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin cing de bzhin nyid tu nan tan du bgyid pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni yun ring po nas/ theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen

bkur ba'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang nye bar gyur pa ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad cing 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid

pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bgyi ba dag go/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la 'brog dgon pa

dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas 'byung ngam/ 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad nyis brgya pa dang / sum brgya pa dang / bzhi brgya pa dang / lnga brgya pa nas 'byung ba zhig mchis la/ de 'byung ba'i tshe grong dang / grong khyer dang grong rdal dang khams dang rgyal po'i pho

brang 'khor gyi snga ltas ba lang rdzi 'am/ phyugs rdzi 'am/ sa mtshams sam/ bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa mthong ngam/ de ma lags pa gzhan yang mtshan ma gang gis grong ngam grong

khyer ram grong rdal lam khams sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor mchis par mngon pa'i snga ltas de lta bu dag mthong na/ de 'di snyam du gyur te/ snga ltas 'di dag snang ba lags na/ 'di nas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ khams

sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ni nye'o snyam ste/ dbugs phyin par 'gyur zhing / de la de slan chad rkun po'i 'jigs pa 'am/ chom po'i 'jigs pa 'am/ gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa 'am/ bkres pa dang / skom pa'i 'jigs pa ma

mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad par gyur te/ 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang /

kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi ba ste/ ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ de slan chad nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sas 'jigs par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad

du zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan du mchis pa de nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snga ltas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis da rung yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus spobs pa bskyed cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig rgya mtsho mching rnams chen po blta

bar 'tshal nas/ de rgya mtsho chen po blta ba'i slad du/ de ji lta ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar mchis pa de lta de ltar ldum bu 'am ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am/ ri'i mtshan ma mthong na/ des 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po thag nye

ste/ 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po ring po med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni bags kyis gzhol ba ste/ 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po'i drung du da ni ring po med do/ /de dang nye ba na ni ldum bu 'am/ ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am ri'i

mtshan ma gang yang med do zhes bgyi bar rig go/ /de ltar skyes bu de'i mig gis rgya mtsho chen po ma mthong du lags kyang / des bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar gyur to/ /rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di na yod do/ /rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di phan

chad mi ring ngo zhes bgyi bar rtogs par 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid

pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod bskal pa ni 'di snyed cig /bskal pa brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig /bskal pa stong

phrag ni 'di snyed cig /bskal pa brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon sum du lung bstan pas da dung lung ma bstan gyis kyang / bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang nye bar gnas par blta'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bdag

gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur du yod la mnyan du yod do/ /thos nas kyang gzung du yod do/ /bcang du yod/ klag du yod/ kun chub par byar yod/ tshul bzhin du yid la byar yod

do zhes bgyi bar rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ dpyid kyi dus la bab ste/ rtsi shing gi lo ma dang 'dab ma lhags nas kha dog gyur pa'i tshe/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis/ ring po mi thogs par lo ma dang

me tog dang 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar snga ltas 'di dag rtsi shing las snang ngo zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ gang gi tshe rtsi shing rnams lo ma dang me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs

par gyur pa de'i tshe yang bud med dang skyes pa dang khye'u dang / bu mo dag gis rtsi shing gi lo ma dang me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa de dag mthong nas/ nyams bde bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyan du mchis te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub

par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de'i tshe/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des kyang 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba

dang / phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyan du yod pa dang / ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan byar yod pa ni/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar

gyur to zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de na lha'i bu sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba ji snyed gcig mchis pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i snga ltas de dag mthong nas/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams lung bstan par 'gyur ba la yang snga ltas 'di dag byung gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di 'ang ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan

par 'gyur ro zhes dga' zhing spro la/ yid bde zhing nyams bde bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ bud med sbrum pa ni ji lta ji ltar btsar nye ba de lta de ltar lus 'gyur te/ de lta de ltar slar zhing lus ngal la

rgyud zhan zhing mi dga' la kha zas yi gar mi mchi zhing rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyang chung du 'gyur te/ nyams mi bde ba des smra ba nyung zhing / bsten pa'i ngang tshul ma mchis la/ sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma lags pa'i yid la bgyid

pa bsten pa dang bsnyen pa des rnam pa de lta bu'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/ bud med gzhan dag gis bud med de'i mtshan ma ji lta ji ltar mthong ba las bud med 'di ni ring po mi thogs par btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar

'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba/ legs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su

bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams la yang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad par 'gyur te/ 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin

du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis spobs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus skyes so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de ltar legs par yongs su gzung ba ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i tshogs skye bo phal po che'i don dang /

phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can brgya stong mang po la phan 'dogs te/

bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don du spyod pa dang / don 'thun par spyod pa ste/ de dag gis sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad

med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug la gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag

kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong la/ gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang tshul khrims srung la/ gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang bzod pa bsgom la/ gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag

par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom la/ gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang bsam gtan la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang shes rab

sgom la/ gzhan yang shes rab sgom pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god kyang bdag rgyun du zhugs

pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed do/ /gzhan lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la rab tu 'god kyang / bdag rang byang chub mngon du mi byed do/ /bdag kyang

sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa

dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang / tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus

dang bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnon la/ gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu 'god do/ /bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su

dag par byed la/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed la/ gzhan yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yang dag par bskul lo/ /

bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa skyed la/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su sbyong la/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su sbyong

ba la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed la/ gzhan yang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la/ gzhan yang

gzugs phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la/ gzhan yang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang

gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la gzhan yang gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sgom la/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi

chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /

mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga sgom la/ gzhan yang mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang ting

nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad sgom la/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag

par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad sgrub la/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed la/ gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong la/ gzhan yang bag

chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bdag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor la/ gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la yang dag par bskul lo/ /de skad ces

bka' stsal pa dang / /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan mang po dang ldan pa de dag sems can thams cad kyi

slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/ /
bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i

'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong

pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom

pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis

gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nam ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos

ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam gzugs kyi 'grib pa yang dag par

rjes su ma mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom

pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nam skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nam pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i

tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
